title: Ep. 727 - The Evil Quacks Mutilating Our Children
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, millions of children are being experimented on, abused, and mutilated, all in the name of gender ideology. The problem has reached epidemic proportions. So much so that even some mainstream media outlets have started to notice. We’ll talk about the problem today. Also Five Headlines including the mayor of Chicago announcing that she will only accept interviews from non-white reporters. One elected politician in Washington had the courage to condemn her for this bigotry, and it wasn’t a Republican. Also, is Prince Harry a victim of emotional abuse? In our Daily Cancellation, we’ll consider the mother on Tik Tok who is worried that her white male baby will grow up to be awful, and has developed a plan to prevent that from happening.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
